original_title: 主婦売春グループ 濡れた淫婦
overview: A widowed ikebana instructor has debt issues due to her late husband's penchant for gambling, and moonlights as a prostitute in order to pay down the debt. Jealousy leads her to lure one of her students, a happily married young woman, into prostitution...
title: Shufu baishun group: Nureta inpu
